group_1.textCenter: O sacred tree, where the spirits of our ancestors@dwell…I, your descendant Tsuyu Mizuna, do pledge...
...to vanquish the Demons who unleash calamity@upon the land of Soma and plunge its people@into darkness...

group_1.textRight: Eep! Please be careful, Tsuruno...

group_1.textLeft: Gah... So that mirror warped us smack-dab@into the Warring States period,
and barely one step in, I already tripped...

group_1.textRight: It's not exactly a smooth start...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, no kidding...
Wait, shoot, the Soul Vessel!@Did it break?!

group_1.textRight: Ah...
Uh, erm...nope, it's all good!@It wasn't even scratched!
Considering the Soul Vessel is@a crucial tool for saving Iroha,
I'm frankly a little insulted that you@assumed I'd allow it to be that fragile.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, sorry, I didn't mean to knock you@or anything...
But now I see we don't have to worry@about carrying it around.

group_1.textRight: Indeed, that's the key takeaway.

group_1.textLeft: Um, this is a little off-topic, but...
Are we sure this is where Iroha was?
Is this the era where her concept@broke apart...?

group_1.textRight: As I've not yet had the opportunity@to analyze the records she gathered,
there are significant gaps in@our understanding of this era.
We're certain, however, that the place@and time are correct.

group_1.narration: "The year is approximately 1540,@in the midst of the Warring States period,@when this area was known as the land of Soma."
"We've been placed shortly before the lords@of this domain joined arms and restored@Mizuna's territory to Lord Masatsuna."
"There are two Magical Girls of note,@Tsuyu Mizuna and Chizuru,@known in this era as Battle Shamanesses."
"Iroha observed these events from@the skies in order to gather their records..."

group_1.textLeft: So...if we follow those two girls...

group_1.textRight: Perhaps we can retrieve Iroha's concept@along the way.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm... That makes sense, but...@How are we supposed to find them?

group_1.textRight: I feel like the art museum in Kamihama@had information on this...?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, it had the story of how the magpie brought@them together, and there was also Tsuyu's diary...

group_1.textRight: I guess for now, why don't we take a look around@while reaching out for magic signatures?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, and we should also consider setting up@a home base where we can rest.

group_1.textRight: Ah, that's right...
Huh...? S-something's...at my feet...

group_1.textLeft: AAAAAAAAHHHH! IT'S A DEAD GUY!

group_1.textRight: A m-m-mummy...!
No, it's just an emaciated corpse.

group_1.textLeft: How can you be so calm at a time like this?!@This is a big deal! A REALLY big deal!

group_1.textRight: No, this is entirely expected ― this era is@in the throes of a deadly famine.

group_1.textLeft: Huh...
So how is that NOT a big deal?!

group_1.textRight: [chara:100401:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Ts-Tsuruno...someone's coming this way...!

group_1.textLeft: Crap, the locals must've heard me@screaming my head off...

group_1.narration: "If she's out here this late,@she may be the Battle Shamaness...!@But she'll be no match for all of us!"

group_1.textCenter: In times of war, we are all soldiers!
We'll work as one to topple Mizuna's sacred tree!
WE'LL MAKE THEM KNOW OUR PAIN!

group_1.textRight: Tsuruno...

group_1.textLeft: ...I guess a quiet start was@too much to hope for!
